Home » 40P8 Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)
37 Cittasampayuttaduka
Cittasampayuttaduka
56.
179Nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  cittaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  cittaṃ paṭicca cittasampayuttakā khandhā.
180(Paccanīyadukamattāni na vattabbaṃ dhammaṃ pūretuṃ nava nava pañhāni karotu.)
181Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca…pe…  aññamaññe cha…pe…  purejāte āsevane ekaṃ…pe…  avigate nava.
<< 36 Cetasikadukaup38 Cittasaṃsaṭṭhaduka >>
